Package business.entities

Class Character

java.lang.Object
business.entities.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cleric, Warrior, Wizard
public class Character extends Object
Class representing a character in the application's business model.

It provides a basic representation that holds the characters name, owner, experience points, stats, class and combat information.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(String name, String player, int xp, int body, int mind, int spirit, String class_)
      Constructor with name, player, xp, body, mind, spirit and class parameters, for new characters.
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the character's name
      player - a string representation of the character's owner
      xp - an int representation of the character's experience points
      body - an int representation of the character's body stat
      mind - an int representation of the character's mind stat
      spirit - an int representation of the character's spirit stat
      class_ - a string representation of the character's class

    • getDamage

      public int getDamage(int hit, int size)
      Method that makes the character calculate how much damage it will deal.
      Parameters:
      hit - an int representation of a d10 roll which determines if the attack is a hit, a critical hit or a miss
      size - an int representation of how many monsters are left in the encounter
      Returns:
      an int representation of the damage the character will deal

    • takeDamage

      Parameters:
      damage - an int representation of the damage the character will take
      damageType - a string representation of the damage type the character will take

      Parameters:
      adventureParty - an array list of characters
      monsters - an array list of monsters
      targets - an array of integers that represent the combatants that are targeted
      Returns:
      an array of integers that represent the combatants that are targeted
